trans-unit.source: Defines an interest in specific workflow status events that occur in a root workflow instance; used for matching by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"></xref> in a tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: 루트 워크플로 인스턴스의; 발생 하는 특정 워크플로 상태 이벤트에 관심을 정의 합니다. 일치에 사용 된 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint"> </xref> 추적 프로필에서 합니다.
이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Whenever the status of the workflow instance changes, the workflow instance emits a workflow status event based on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]워크플로 인스턴스의 상태가 변경 될 때마다 워크플로 인스턴스 중 하나를 기반으로 워크플로 상태 이벤트를 내보냅니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>런타임 추적 인프라에 대 한 값.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: A WorkflowTrackingLocation expresses an interest in locations of the workflow instance where specific types of workflow status events occur.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowTrackingLocation 특정 형식의 워크플로 상태 이벤트를 발생 하는 워크플로 인스턴스의 위치에 관심을 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> to specify the workflow status events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>값을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A>일치 시킬 워크플로 상태 이벤트를 지정 하려면.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: A single WorkflowTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 단일 WorkflowTrackingLocation 워크플로 인스턴스의 잠재적 실행 경로 있는 둘 이상의 실제 위치를 참조할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can add a WorkflowTrackingLocation to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>에 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> 에 대 한 일치 매개 변수를 정의 하기 위해</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 에 WorkflowTrackingLocation를 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation"></xref> class.
No workflow status events to match are specified.
trans-unit.target: 일치 시킬 워크플로 상태 이벤트 없음이 지정 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You must add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to match any workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: 추가 해야 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>값을 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A>에 대 한는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation>워크플로 상태 이벤트와 일치 하도록.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation.Events%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation"></xref> class that matches the specified tracking workflow events.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화 합니다는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation"> </xref> 클래스 지정 된 일치 하는 워크플로 이벤트를 추적 합니다.

trans-unit.source: IList of tracking workflow events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 일치 시킬 추적 워크플로 이벤트의 IList입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of workflow status events that will be matched for this location.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치에 대 한 워크플로 목록이 있습니다 상태 이벤트를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Events contains the list of workflow status events for which this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> will be matched.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트는이 워크플로 상태 이벤트 목록을 포함 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation>일치 됩니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You can track the specified workflow status events by adding the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is part of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>즉 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 부분</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> 에</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> 를</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> 추가 하 여 지정 된 워크플로 상태 이벤트를 추적할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A list of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"></xref> values that specifies the workflow status events for which the location will be matched.
trans-unit.target: 목록이 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent"> </xref> 는 위치를 일치 시킬 워크플로 상태 이벤트를 지정 하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.
